name: botwMap
title: The Most Detailed Map of Hyrule
shortDescription: Find every bug, monster, and plant in Hyrule from Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
thumbnailAlt: A fantasy map of Hyrule from The Legend of Zelda, appearing to be on an old worn piece of paper.

name: anagramConstructor
title: Real-Time Anagram Constructor
shortDescription: Draft anagrams while getting word suggestions in real time. Inspired by Taskmaster.
thumbnailAlt: Colorful bunting with letters printed on it

name: dataInColors
title: Data In Colors
shortDescription: Turn anything, such as music or documents, into a mosaic of colors similar to a QR code.
thumbnailAlt: A playground overlayed with a grid of colorful squares. The photo is shaped like a vinyl record.

name: digitsInColors
title: Digits In Colors
shortDescription: Visualize numbers as geometric shapes by breaking them down into their prime factors.
thumbnailAlt: A colorful collection of shapes organized in a branching formation to represent the number 108.

name: acronames
title: Acroname Generator
shortDescription: Create acronyms with the first and last names of you and your peers.

name: doodleTheater
title: Doodle Theater
shortDescription: Puppeteer 2D digital puppets using the mouse and keyboard with up to two other people.
thumbnailAlt: A doodle of a chicken, a unicorn, a hedgehog, and a pig.

name: musicCalculator
title: Musical Combinations Calculator
shortDescription: Calculate how many possible songs could be written in one measure of music, given the parameters you set.
thumbnailAlt: A random assortment of music notation symbols

name: crackerMultiplication
title: Cracker Multiplication
shortDescription: Visualize how long multiplication works by snapping a virtual cracker.
thumbnailAlt: A segmented rectangular cracker, where the widths and lengths of the segments are measured

name: asciiMason
title: Ascii Mason
shortDescription: A demo for an RPG creation tool that I made, but ultimately did not complete.
thumbnailAlt: Minimalist pixel art of a bird by a river and some trees

name: beetleRace
title: Beetle Race
shortDescription: A platformer made for speedrunning, where you can change your movement abilities.
thumbnailAlt: The title screen for Beetle Race, featuring the playable characters in pixel art.

name: frodo
title: Frodo Has a Flamethrower
thumbnailAlt: A cartoonish drawing of Frodo holding a flamethrower next to Samwise

name: wifiPassword
title: Wifi Password Simulator
shortDescription: Try to find the WiFi password on a college campus.
thumbnailAlt: A student in the game standing in the Student Resource Center

name: xkcdAdventure
title: An XKCD Adventure
shortDescription: Explore a small map full of references to the XKCD webcomic.
thumbnailAlt: Two stick figures near a graveyard

name: sheepCounter
title: Sheep Counter
shortDescription: It's the 21st century. Why should YOU have to count the sheep?
thumbnailAlt: A sheep hopping over a log

name: snowflakeSky
title: Procedurally Generated Snowflakes
shortDescription: Watch them fall from the sky.
thumbnailAlt: White procedurally generated snowflakes against a black background

name: javascriptLibraries
title: Javascript Libraries
shortDescription: Some Javascript libraries for developers to use, particularly with P5JS.
